result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Glenn S Lale

records.addlTxt: Signed and filed.

Defendant Glenn S Lale in court.  Attorney Douglas Michael Bihler in court for Glenn S Lale.  Attorney Alexandria S. Carlson in court for State of Wisconsin. Counsel informed Court there has been a breakdown in communication.  Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Case is passed to allow the defendant to contact SPD.

***
Recalled at 2:58 PM. Defendant Glenn S Lale in court.  Attorney Alexandria S. Carlson in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant is not qualified for a State Public Defender. Court appoints Sarah Zwach as counsel for defendant at the rate of $100.00 per hour.  Attorney Zwach accepts appointment.  Defendant shall reimburse Milwaukee County at the rate of $50.00 on the 1st of every month, commencing 1/1/2023 until paid in full. Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means. Case is adjourned in Branch 36.
Status conference scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Proposed Order Appointing Counsel at County Expense
Justice Point Pretrial Services Supervision Report received and filed.  nk

Motion Hearing exhibits from 09/29/22 inventoried on this date.
Location: BOX 791
Letter from defendant.  (Glenn S. Lale, 3333 5th Ave - 6J, South Milwaukee WI 53172).
filed.

Defendant Glenn S Lale in court.  Attorney Douglas Michael Bihler in court for Glenn S Lale.  Attorney Alexandria S. Carlson in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for motion hearing. Court ordered witnesses sequestered. Sworn for the state: #1 South Milwaukee Police Officer Nathan Siefert. Direct examination. Exhibit 1 marked, offered and received. Cross examination proceeded. State rests. Defense rests. Testimony closed. Closing arguments by state and defense. For reasons stated on the record, the Court DENIED the defense motion to suppress evidence; illegal seizure. Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 36; all conditions of bail remain. Status conference scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Supervision Report received and filed.  nk

Prosecuting attorney Alexandria S. Carlson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Glenn S Lale and Attorney Douglas Michael Bihler were in court prior to calling the case. Court had no court reporter and is in jury trial. All parties were prepared to proceed. Case is adjourned in Branch 36.
Motion hearing scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Received and Filed.

Defendant Glenn S Lale in court with attorney Douglas Michael Bihler.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Glenn S Lale appeared by video means with Attorney. Stayed warrant is vacated. Motion to adjourn motion hearing is granted. Case is adjourned.  All parties are notified that effective July 30, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Laura A. Crivello, Branch 36,  in Room 608 of the Courthouse.  Motion hearing scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and filed. Justice Point Supervision Report. Deputy Court Clerk: LVD
Notice of Motion To Adjourn; filed.
STATES RESPONSE, filed.

Defendant Glenn S Lale in court with attorney Douglas Michael Bihler.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW  
Case set for Motion hearing.  Defense request an adjournment. For reasons presented to the Court.   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date. Case adjourned, branch 38.  Motion hearing scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Motion to Adjourn Hearing; filed.

Defendant Glenn S Lale in court with attorney Douglas Michael Bihler.  Samuel E. Simpson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW 
Case set for scheduling conference. Defense counsel received discovery and offer and request case set for motion hearing.  Court orders case for adjourned, Branch 38.  Motion hearing scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Motion To Suppress; filed.

Defendant Glenn S Lale in court with attorney Douglas Michael Bihler.  Samuel E. Simpson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. All parties, including the judge, appear via zoom.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW
CASE HELD VIA ZOOM. Case set for scheduling conference. Defense counsel received discovery and offer and request case set for hearing. Court ordered an motions to be filed by defense within 21 days. Court orders case for adjourned, Branch 38.

This hearing will be streamed live on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrrcCaQQ0VRU4DVk2yndPUQ  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Glenn S Lale in court with Attorney Douglas Michael Bihler.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Court took judicial notice of the defendants 7 prior convictions. Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: South Milwaukee Officer N. Siefert.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 38.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 18, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Letter from defendant requesting a hearing on citation BH435985-4.
Letter from defendant pleading NOT GUILTY.  (Glenn Lale, 3333 5th Ave UNIT 6J, South Milwaukee WI 53172).
filed.

Adjustment Number: 22A 004812,
Payable Number: 979766,
Receipt Number: 22RP002441,
Amount: $20.00

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.
The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  
Defendant to be monitored by portable breathalyzers.  
ABSOLUTELY No driving without a valid license.
Defendant waived time limits for Preliminary Hearing.

Defendant Glenn S Lale in court with attorney Douglas Michael Bihler.  Defendant Glenn S Lale in custody.  Owen M Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Glenn S Lale appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
